name: East India Company: Battle of Trafalgar
name_original: East India Company: Battle of Trafalgar
description:
East India Company: Battle of Trafalgar is an action, strategy and simulation game developed by Nitro Games. It came out on 08-12-2009. It was published by Paradox Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
East India Company: Battle of Trafalgar is available on PC.
